hero.title: Our Works
hero.subtitle: Making a difference in our community

works.title: Education Support
works.description: We provide regular tuition classes at our centers and help children gain admission to reputable schools. In addition, we prepare students for competitive examinations such as Jawahar Navodaya, JEE, and SSC, among others.

works.title: Co-curricular Activities
works.description: We promote co-curricular activities among children by offering karate classes and others. The Kartavya Sports Meet (KSM) is conducted annually.

works.title: Annual Fest PRAKASH
works.description: Our annual fest, PRAKASH, provides children with a platform to participate in various events, including dance, singing, poetry, science exhibitions, and martial arts demonstrations.

works.title: Awareness Camps
works.description: We organize awareness camps on social issues, health, and well-being.

works.title: Vocational Training
works.description: We provide vocational training to women at our sewing centers.
